doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Swapan Bandyopadhyay
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Cancer Research & HospitalProfessor & Head of the Department,Sir Salimullah Medical College & Mitford Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Swapan Bandyopadhyay is a Cancer Specialist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Oncology), MPhil (Radiotherapy). He is now working as a Professor & Head of the Department at Sir Salimullah Medical College & Mitford Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Medinova Medical Services, Malibagh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Swapan Bandyopadhyay at Medinova Medical Services, Malibagh is 6.30pm to 9.30pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Gemcon Business Tower, 255 New Circular Road, Malibagh, Dhaka

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Moarraf Hossen
doctor.degree: MBBS, DMRT (BSMMU), FCPS (Radiotherapy), Fellowship Training (India, Singapore)
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Cancer Research & Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Moarraf Hossen is a Oncologist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, DMRT (BSMMU), FCPS (Radiotherapy), Fellowship Training (India, Singapore). He is a Former Director cum Professor, Radiotherapy at National Institute of Cancer Research & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Green Life Hospital, Dhaka & Green Life Hospital, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Moarraf Hossen at Green Life Hospital, Dhaka is 6pm to 9pm (Sat, Sun, Wed & Thu).

chamber.address: 32, Bir Uttam Shafiullah Sarak (Green Road), Dhanmondi, Dhaka
